Index of Directories

This is a somewhat abbreviated list of the directories on the Archive. Directories for individual competition games and outdated game versions have been omitted. For a really absolutely complete list of directories, see here.

About the IF-Archive.

  • Past week: brief, verbose
  • Past month: brief, verbose
  • Past three months: brief, verbose
  • Past year: brief, verbose
  • All files, sorted by date: brief, verbose

Or, enter the Archive.

if-archive
if-archive/art

Art stuff.

if-archive/comp

Competitions. This is a long line of text so we can see how the column width is going to work out in real life.

if-archive/comp/files
if-archive/games

Games stuff.

if-archive/games/old/older
if-archive/space dir
if-archive/space dir/"ascquot"
if-archive/space dir/"ascquot"/dir

The IF Archive is a public service of the Interactive Fiction Technology Foundation.
